name: Project Maze (itch) (yesitsskm)
description: Project Maze is a single-player first-person game where you’re put into a maze itself with some markers (which you can use to place in your path in order to keep track of the path which you’re on) and some jumps (which will give you a better overview of the maze) and use these and your maze solving skills to try and get out of the maze.
